pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw: If it doesn't have all four interfaces, then the remaining tests are more or less bound to fail because they depend on (most of) those four interfaces being available. That being said, we do assert the existence of each of those interfaces later before using them, so the assert isn't really necessary here.
content.html: If it doesn't have all four interfaces, then the remaining tests are more or less bound to fail because they depend on (most of) those four interfaces being available. That being said, we do assert the existence of each of those interfaces later before using them, so the assert isn't really necessary here.
